item.description: 1. 安装编译相关 # yum -y groupinstall "Development tools" yum -y install zlib-devel bzip2-devel openssl-devel ncurses-devel sqlite-devel readline-devel tk-devel gdbm-devel db4-devel libpcap-devel xz-devel yum install libffi-devel -y 2. 下载安装包解压 # wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.7.0/Python-3.7.0.tar.xz tar -xvJf Python-3.7.0.tar.xz 3.编译安装python # mkdir /usr/python3 #创建编译安装目录 cd Python-3.7.0 ./configure --prefix=/usr/python3 make && make install 4.创建软连接 # ln -s /usr/python3/bin/python3 /usr/bin/python3 ln -s /usr/python3/bin/pip3 /usr/bin/pip3 5. 验证是否成功 # python3 -V pip3 -V
